9 . R eaders are referred to O tani and W hitm an (1991) for the argum ent in favor of verb
raising in K orean from a different perspective from K oizum i.
1 0 . A lthough K oizum i (1995) claim s that his analysis holds for all absolute head-final
languages like K orean, he does not actually provide K orean exam ples.
Sun-W oong Kim
